channel.title: Spotify songs data on Linlin Li's Data Science Project Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Spotify songs data on Linlin Li's Data Science Project Portfolio

item.title: Create a Sqlite3 database for Spotify songs data
item.description: In this article, I would share my experience in creating a Sqlite3 database to store Spotify songs data in the 3rd Normal Form using Python. It is quite easy, everyone who has some basic Python skills can follow my steps and try to do it. You can find my Github repository for this blog here. Data source: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2020/2020-01-21. Step 0: load data At the beginning, I use pandas.read_csv to load the data.
